condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Dam Construction Supervision and Quality Assurance Plan | Description :Prepare a Dam Construction Supervisionand Quality Assurance Plan and an estimate of funds needed to prepare and implement such plan in detail prior to bid tendering ofthe rehabilitation works under the Project. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Dam Safety Inspections | Description :Have periodic dam safety inspections performed by independentprofessionals, with qualifications, experience, and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Dam Safety Reports | Description :Furnish to the Association for review and thereafter take all necessarymeasures required to address the conclusions and recommendations of the review and update or adopt Dam Safety Plans, in form andsubstance acceptable to the Association, and reflecting the conclusions and recommendations of the Panel | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Emergency Preparedness Plan | Description :Prepare an updated Dam Emergency Preparedness Plan prior to bidtendering of the rehabilitation works under the Project; and a final Dam Emergency Preparedness Plan not later than one (1) yearprior to the completion of the rehabilitation works. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Land Acquisition and Cash Compensation | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entity,from its own non-Project resources, finance all costs associated to land acquisition and cash compensation under Parts B and C ofthe Project, before any displacement. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Operation and Maintenance Plan and Dam Instrumentation Plan | Description :Prepare an updated Dam Operation andMaintenance Plan and a Dam Instrumentation Plan prior to bid tendering of the rehabilitation works under the Project; and a finalDam Operation and Maintenance Plan and a Dam Instrumentation Plan not later than one (1) year prior to the completion of therehabilitation works. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Pane of Experts: Dam Safety | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entity to: (i)appoint and thereafter maintain with at least two visits per year until one year after the Closing date of the Project, anindependent Dam Safety Panel of Experts with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to the Association. |Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :Panel of Experts: Environment and Social | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project ImplementingEntity to appoint and thereafter maintain with at least two visits per year until one year after the Closing date of the Project,an independent Environmental and Social Panel of Experts with qualifications, experience and terms of reference satisfactory to theAssociation | Frequency :SemiAnnual

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Instruments: Implementation | Description :The Recipient shall cause the Project Implementing Entityto disclose the Safeguard Instruments in country and at the Infoshop and implement the Project in accordance with the SafeguardInstruments. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Safeguard Instruments: Preapration | Description :Not later than March 30, 2015 and in any event prior to thecarrying out of any rehabilitation works under the Project, cause the Project Implementing Entity to: (i) in accordance with termsof reference and process acceptable to the Association, prepare the safeguard instruments and furnish said instruments to theAssociation for its review and approval ( “Safeguard Instruments”). | Due Date :30-Mar-2015
